title: RoC CompleteLift Serum, 1.3-Ounce Bottle
description: This smooth, silky fluid glides on easily and absorbs quickly leaving your skin feeling velvety smooth. Patent-pending Protient lifting & firming technology – a high-performance tightening agent – works to help firm and tone skin for a visibly lifted and more defined look.

title: RoC Multi-Correxion Eye Treatment, 0.5 Ounce
description: RoC MULTI CORREXION Eye TreatmentRoC MULTI CORREXION Eye Treatment diminishes the look of dark circles and wrinkles for more luminous eyes.How It WorksThis breakthrough formula contains an exclusive fusion of age-fighting ingredients specially formulated for the delicate eye area. Antioxidants help defend against the look of aging that can be caused by skin-damaging free radicals. Pure RoC RETINOL smoothes wrinkles and complements skin's renewal process. And vitamin C helps rejuvenate skin tone.What Results Can I Expect?Dark circles and puffiness are noticeably diminished and wrinkles appear visibly smoothed in just eight weeks, revealing newer, younger-looking skin.Usage TipsApply in small dots around the eye area and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Use alone or under makeup in the morning and in the evening.How Can RoC Retinol Improve My Skin?Retinol is one of the most effective ingredients for reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles.When you are young, your skin cells continuously renew themselves, which keeps your skin looking smooth. As time passes, however, your skin's ability to renew itself gradually slows down. Skin loses its elasticity and wrinkles become more evident. What you need is something to help keep it looking younger and healthier.This is the benefit of Retinol. Retinol is a pure form of Vitamin A that works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles.RoC MULTI CORREXIONEye TreatmentAt a Glance:This advanced formula is clinically proven* to:Noticeably diminish the look of dark circles and puffinessVisibly smooth the appearance of wrinklesAdvice for Getting the Most Out of Retinol ProductsStart Early:It is often recommended to begin using a Retinol product in your late twenties to early thirties. Early use of Retinol products can actually help to combat fine lines and wrinkles before they become apparent, so your skin stays looking younger and healthier.Start Slowly:Using Retinol is like exercising. You don't start out running a marathon. Begin by applying a small amount (a little goes a long way) every other day for about two weeks. After two weeks, you may begin applying more frequently until you find the best routine for your skin.Stick with It:It is important to be consistent, as the benefits of Retinol are seen over time. If you happen to experience minor skin irritation, this may be temporary while your skin adjusts to the products. Just decrease usage for a few days and work your way back up after that.Protect your skin:Whether you use a Retinol product during the night or day, always remember to wear a sunscreen of SPF 15 or higher during the day.RoC: A History of Skincare ExpertiseRoC was founded in France in 1957 by pharmacist Jean-Charles Lissarrague and a collaboration of dermatologists. From the beginning, RoC developed strong partnerships with dermatologists, helping it become the skincare leader in France. In 1999, RoC brought its anti-aging expertise to the U.S.Since then, RoC has continued to build on its unique understanding of the skin aging process to develop the best and most effective skincare solutions for women in the U.S. RoC products in the U.S. are not only derived from extensive research and thorough clinical studies, but also from a proven track record of success with European women.What's in the BoxRoC MULTI CORREXION Eye Treatment (0.5 Fluid Ounces, 15 Milliliters).Skin Renewing Serum4-Zone Daily Moisturizer SPF 30Night TreatmentEye TreatmentLift Anti-Gravity SerumLift Anti-Gravity Daily Moisture SPF 30Lift Anti-Gravity Eye CreamLift Anti-Gravity Night CreamTrademark Information:RoC® MULTI CORREXION®

title: RoC CompleteLift Eye Cream, 0.5-Ounce Tube
description: Increases skin firmness around the eyes, gives eyelids a visibly lifted look, and reduces puffiness to make eyes look younger and more awake. This light, silky fluid absorbs quickly and begins working immediately with a unique blend of wheat polyner and patent-pending Protient lifting & firming technology – a high-performance tightening agent – to help firm and tone the skin around your eyes.

title: RoC Multi-Correxion Night Treatment, 1 Ounce
description: The ROC MULTI CORREXION line contains breakthrough products that diminish the appearance of multiple signs of aging with the exclusive fusion of pure RoC RETINOL and antioxidants. RoC MULTI CORREXION Night Treatment provides a comprehensive anti-aging solution to diminish the look of the most noticeable signs of aging and reveal new, younger looking skin.How It WorksThis breakthrough formula contains an exclusive fusion of age-fighting ingredients. Antioxidants help defend against the look of aging. Pure RoC RETINOL smoothes wrinkles and complements skin's natural process. Vitamin C helps rejuvenate skin tone.What Results Can I Expect?In just four weeks, dark circles are visibly diminished and skin tone and luminescence are noticeably improved. In just eight weeks, the appearance of pores and skin discolorations are visibly diminished. In just 12 weeks, the look of fine lines and wrinkles is visibly diminished. Skin firmness and elasticity are also improved. The result -- overall younger-looking, more beautiful skin.Usage TipsApply to face and neck after cleansing. The treatment can be used alone or under your regular moisturizer. For best results, use twice daily. You may experience mild tingling or redness during use. This is normal and should be temporary until your skin adjusts. If applying an additional moisturizer, use one free of Retinol.How Can RoC RETINOL Improve My Skin?Retinol is one of the most effective ingredients for reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles.When you are young, your skin cells continuously renew themselves, which keeps your skin looking smooth. As time passes, however, your skin's ability to renew itself gradually slows down. Skin loses its elasticity and wrinkles become more evident. What you need is something to help keep it looking younger and healthier.This is the benefit of Retinol. Retinol is a pure form of Vitamin A that works to reduce the appearance of wrinkles.RoC MULTI CORREXION Night TreatmentAt a Glance:Diminishes the appearance of wrinklesImproves elasticityBrightens skinDiminishes the look of dark circlesImproves the appearance of poresAdvice for Getting the Most Out of Retinol ProductsStart Early:It is often recommended to begin using a Retinol product in your late twenties to early thirties. Early use of Retinol products can actually help to combat fine lines and wrinkles before they become apparent, so your skin stays looking younger and healthier.Start Slowly:Using Retinol is like exercising. You don't start out running a marathon. Begin by applying a small amount (a little goes a long way) every other day for about two weeks. After two weeks, you may begin applying more frequently until find the best routine for your skin.Stick with It:It is important to be consistent, as the benefits of Retinol are seen over time. If you happen to experience minor skin irritation, this may be temporary while your skin adjusts to the products. Just decrease usage for a few days and work your way back up after that.Protect your skin:Whether you use a Retinol product during the night or day, always remember to wear a sunscreen of SPF 15 or higher during the day.RoC: A History of Skincare ExpertiseRoC brand was founded in France in 1957 by pharmacist Jean-Charles Lissarrague and a collaboration of dermatologists. From the beginning, RoC developed strong partnerships with dermatologists, helping it become the skincare leader in France. In 1999, the makers of RoC brought its anti-aging expertise to the U.S.Since then, RoC has continued to build on its unique understanding of the skin aging process to develop the best and most effective skincare solutions for women in the U.S. RoC products in the U.S. are not only derived from extensive research and thorough clinical studies, but also from a proven track record of success with European women.What's in the BoxRoC MULTI CORREXION Night Treatment (1 Fluid Ounce).Skin Renewing Serum4-Zone Daily Moisturizer SPF 30Night TreatmentEye TreatmentLift Anti-Gravity SerumLift Anti-Gravity Daily Moisture SPF 30Lift Anti-Gravity Eye CreamLift Anti-Gravity Night CreamTrademark Information:RoC® MULTI CORREXION® Night Treatment

title: Olay Professional Pro-X Anti-Aging Starter Kit
description: Olay Professional ProX Anti-Aging Kit (3pcs). This incredible kit comes with (1) Olay Professional Pro-X Age Repair lotion with SPF 30, (1) Olay Professional Pro-X Wrinkle Smoothing Cream and (1) Olay Professional Pro-X Eye Restoration Complex. Olay Professional is always working in science and anti-aging technology. They guarantee your complete satisfaction using these products.Instructions for better results: Protect skin in the morning with Age Repair Lotion SPF 30, spreading evenly over your face and neck. Treat skin morning and night by applying Eye Restoration Complex to corners, lid, and eye area, massaging until absorbed. Transform skin at night with Wrinkle Smoothing Cream by smoothing over your face and neck.

title: ROC Daily Resurfacing Disks, 3-inches
description: RoC Daily Resurfacing Disks are clinically shown to help diminish the look of fine lines and wrinkles, and improve the appearance of skin in just 1 week. Infused with skin-conditioning cleansers, the self-foaming disk is textured on one side, to gently exfoliate away dirt, oil and complexion dulling impurities, and smooth on the other side to gently cleanse and remove make-up around the delicate eye area. The result – younger-looking, more beautiful skin. Gentle enough for everyday use.

title: RoC BRILLIANCE Night Recharging Moisturizer, Activating Serum & Recharging Creme
description: RoC Brilliance Night Recharging Moisturizer is a breakthrough at-home anti-aging night treatment inspired by the latest professional procedures. It combines science of E-pulse technology with the pampering experience of luxurious skin care to bring new life to the look of your skin. The 2-step process works to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and continues working through the night to soften, smooth and help firm skin.

title: NARS Pure Radiant Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30, Cuba
description: Your skin almost bare, but better. Infused with lush, naturally derived botanicals and ingredients, pure radiant tinted moisturizer SPF 30/PA+++ immediately helps thirsty skin feel hydrated. This advanced, oil-free formula provides a translucent veil of color and sun protection while helping to reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation and dark spots in just four weeks. Kopara from French polynesia and mineral rich seawater revive and re-mineralize skin for a softer, smoother,and brighter natural glow. Skin is transported.

title: Tinted Moisturizer - Almond
description: Laura Mercier's Tinted Moisturizer is perfect for all skin types & provides ideal protection from both UVA & UVB rays with an SPF 20.  1.5 fl. oz.

title: Dial Complete Foaming Anti-bacterial Hand Wash Variety 4-Pack - 7.5 Oz Each

title: U.S. Divers Women's Phantom LX Mask and Palau Snorkel, Aqua
description: Mask Features: Ladies mask - One-size-fits-most; Hypoallergenic silicone face skirt for ultimate comfort; Pro-Glide buckle system for easy adjustments. Snorkel Features: Submersible, dry top snorkel with Pivot; Dry Technology - Designed to keep water out of the breathing tube above and below the surface of the water; Ergonomic silicone mouthpiece provides comfort and reduces jaw fatigue; Flex section maximizes comfort and improves fit; One way purge valve for easy clearing. Snorkel placement - Place snorkel on left side of face attaching snorkel keeper clip to mask strap. Mask Strap: Added comfort, won't pull hair; Neoprene.
